name: New field added in a standard record must be done in a specific KEY sub-record (PeopleSoft)
associatedValueName: Record fields directly defined in the record
description:
New field added in a standard record must be done in a specific <KEY> sub-record, always at the end of the record; except when the last field have type long, then add the new field before this field.
For new record, it's not mandatory to add a specific sub-record. You can add a standard sub-record to a new record.
output: This report lists all the Records with added fields not defined in a sub-record
rationale: New field added in a standard record must be done in a specific KEY sub-record
total: Number of PeopleSoft Records with added fields (MODIFIED)
alternativeName: New field added in a standard record must be done in a specific KEY sub-record (PeopleSoft)
